context.title: E-Research Cenre to Lady Margaret Hall (via park)

scenes.name: Start1
scenes.onload: window.lastWarning=(-10); window.lastGpsWarning=(-10); daoplayer.speak('Waiting for G P S.',true);
scenes.onupdate: if (activity!=null && activity!='NOGPS') {daoplayer.speak('OK, G P S is working',true); daoplayer.setScene('Start/any');}

scenes.name: Start/any
scenes.onupdate: if (waypoints['S1_2'].near) { daoplayer.speak('starting Walk 1', true); daoplayer.setScene('Start/walk1'); } else if (waypoints['S1_1'].near) daoplayer.setScene('Start/oerc'); else if (totalTime-window.lastWarning>20) { window.lastWarning=totalTime; daoplayer.speak('This walk start from the Oxford e-Research Centre, but you seem to be somewhere else', true); }

scenes.name: Start/oerc
scenes.onload: daoplayer.speak('Please walk along keble road and into the park', false);
scenes.onupdate: if (waypoints['S1_2'].near) { daoplayer.speak('starting walk 1', true); daoplayer.setScene('Start/walk1'); } else if (position!=null && !waypoints['S1_1'].near) daoplayer.setScene('Start/any');
